description: The Albula Hybrid Jacket is a versatile, partially insulated jacket for hiking, climbing and ski touring. During strenuous activities, it keeps you warm in the right places and is breathable at the same time. Elastic inserts made from recycled polyester ensure that you can move freely – ideal as insulation when using the layering principle. They focus on all-round eco-friendly production for the Albula Hybrid Jacket: The outer material has been dyed using the resource-saving dope dye process. Innovative Ecodown® recycled synthetic fiber filling offers an excellent heat-weight ratio. The water-repellent treatment used is PFC-free. Synthetic down doesn’t clump when washed and makes the jacket very easy to care for. The Albula line: sustainable and functional with a sporty look.
name: Mammut Albula IN Hybrid Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Recycled polyester elastane knit - 94% Polyester, 6% Elasthan
